WorkItem.Description: For some reason when I build a new upgrade list it's only giving me 3 total items on the list (2 weapons and a helmet). I've built many upgrade lists but for someone reason either with this version (2.3.12) or the last version the feature isnt working properly. It should, at the very least, include all the 277 versions of the gear I'm already wearing since those pieces are obvious upgrades but they aren't on the list. I'm not filtering out any items either, they're are shown in the main gear comparison area of the application. It's frustrating to spend 30 minutes building a new upgrade list to find only 3 items on it. I'm geared but not that geared.

Comments.Message: Please follow the posting guidelines, so that we can possibly help you.
What is it that you need? I've explained the problem.

...
Sigh.

Attach your frelling character files, people. This is silly.
I suppose wasting 4hrs because you couldn't originally post that is silly as well.
"Please follow the posting guidelines, so that we can possibly help you." <-- See that? That's me telling you to post your character file (along with a variety of other things).
Awesome. Thanks for the help. Well....at least I got some pointless responses.
I tried selecting just Armor Tokens in the filter and all upgrades show in the upgrade list. Can you tell me which item specifically doesn't show up for you that you think it should?
I get only Shadowmourne and the 277 Tier 10 helmet. I don't get the 277 version of any of the other Tier pieces, or the 277 version of the any of the 264 gear I'm wearing. Something is wrong.

Do the items you expect to get as upgrades appear in the item popup (clicking on the item) or the right side pane of Rawr (when selecting the proper itemslot) ?
If no, then it's probably your filters that aren't set properly.
Yes, they are there when I'm just browsing items normally. That's the strange part.
